content.rendered:
Jackpots are defined as large cash prizes in games or lotteries. Jackpots are supposed to accumulate over time until they are eventually won. In Kenya today, there are plenty of jackpot games in existence. With the introduction of online betting and gambling platforms, one does not necessarily have to physically go to a dealer or casino. With regards to betting sites, it can be mind-boggling to try to figure out who is minting out the most cash when it comes to jackpot rewards.

Being that there are multiple betting sites that offer jackpot contests on a weekly basis, we got you covered with the latest information about the biggest jackpots around. Other sites offer games such as spin and win that offer daily jackpots.

BetLion jackpot

This is a betting company you probably do not hear much about. Regardless, they have the biggest jackpot which boasts of cash rewards amounting to Ksh.350 Million. Being a new entrant into the Kenyan market, they are keen to become the leading betting site. Their jackpot is so big that it is referred to as “the Goliath Jackpot.” Their mobile website was recently revamped and it is way simple to use. This mega jackpot has a total of 20 games and an additional 3 reserve games. The reserve games are played in case any of the jackpot games gets canceled. The minimum number of accurate bets required to win is 15 out of 20 games.

Betika Jackpot

Betika is one of the biggest sports betting companies in Kenya. One interesting thing about this site is its huge jackpot. At Betika, you are likely to win a total of Ksh. 100 Million if you get all the predictions correctly. The minimum amount of money you are required to stake in this Jackpot contest is Ksh. 49. The jackpot has a total of 17 games and they give out bonuses starting from 12 correct predictions.

Shabiki.com

This is another betting company that offers a lot of money. In comparison to the other betting sites, their jackpot of Ksh. 20 Million may not be much, but for an ordinary Kenyan, this is plenty of cash. In this betting site, one can take part in the jackpot with as little as Ksh. 20. There are a total of 15 games and bonuses start from 12 games. The fact that the betting amount is low, plenty of Kenyans tend to gravitate towards this betting site.

Mozzartbet

If you are are a regular punter and you have a low fear of losing, then look no further. Mozzarbet is one of the few betting sites in Kenya that has jackpot games running almost on a daily basis. Every day, they pick a maximum of 13 games from different leagues. Getting all 13 bets correctly wins you Ksh.10 Million while getting 12 out of the total 13 games only wins you Ksh.100, 000. If you only get 8 correct predictions,  Ksh 50 will be refunded to your account and you will get another chance to try your luck.

There are a number of other betting sites with good jackpot cash prices which did not make it into this list. A worthy mention is  BetPawa which allows the jackpot winner to walk away with ksh. 20 million.

Spin the Wheel

Spin the Wheel gives players a chance to win various amounts of Cash. You can walk away with millions from winning a roulette game.
